name: html-prettify
description: HTML, CSS, JavaScript and JSON code formatter for Sublime Text 2 and 3 via node.js
author: Victor Porof

scripts.clobber: npm run clean:build && npm run clean:deps
scripts.release:local: npm run clean:build && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'Update node_modules and build'
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:local && npm version patch
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:local && npm version minor
scripts.release:major: npm run release:local && npm version major
